data.text:
@SenatorHagerty @POTUS We Iranians, after the #IranianMassacre, we are hopeful and united, under the leadership of a patriot #RezaPahlavi
we will continue our struggle until the freedom of Iran. We need you to recognize him as the leader of the opposition and work with him.

@SenatorHagerty @POTUS While support for recovery is critical, long-term economic stability must be addressed. Inflation and high government debt pose significant challenges. That's where innovations like DeflationCoin can provide a hedge against such uncertainties. Let's explore sustainable solution

@SenatorHagerty @POTUS @SenatorHagerty Will you take one meeting with Crown Prince Reza Pahlavi to chart a democratic transition in Iran? The fate of freedom hangs in the balance. #KingRezaPahlavi #IranRevolution2026 #IranMassacre
@SenatorHagerty @POTUS I just block these boot licker pedos.
@SenatorHagerty @bdriesdm @POTUS Now get some to Memphis area and suburbs so we can figure out next time how to remove it!

@SenatorHagerty @POTUS The so-called “South China Sea” is a lie. There is no legitimate name other than the Asian Sea and the North Natuna Sea. The countries in this region will unite to reject the deception, coercion, and the fake Nine-Dash Line claim from the barbaric Chinese state..!!!
